freezeTip.message: The system has detected that this account has cheating/improper behaviors in {names} . The account is locked. Please contact your teacher or platform admin.

overErrorTimes.message: You have tried 5 times and the account is locked. Please retry after 3 minutes.

faceSuccess.message: Your face identity is verified and the exam will start in 3 seconds.

noCameraTip.message: The camera is in use or access to it is denied. Please close the program using camera and/or allow camera access by ULearning.

notSupportTip.message: This exam does not support web participation. Please use the type of exam device specified to take the exam.

noFaceTip.message: Face verification is enabled for this exam, and you can start the exam after completing face verification.

lateLimitTip.message: Not allowed to take the exam after {time} minutes from the start of the exam

submitLimitType.message: The exam is not allowed to submit within {min} minutes after the exam starts

deviceMonitorTip.message: {deviceMonitor} is on - Do not switch to another device or browser during the exam!

ipMonitorTip.message: {ipMonitor} is on - Do not switch to another network during the exam!

cutScreenMonitorTip1.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is on - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App for more than {s} seconds in a single switch or for more than {times} times!

cutScreenMonitorTip2.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is on - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App for more than {times} times!

cutScreenMonitorTip3.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is on - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App for more than {s} seconds in a single switch!

faceMonitorTip.message: {faceMonitor} is on - Need to pass face verification to start the exam!

cameraMonitorTip.message: {cameraMonitor} is on - Keep the front-facing camera on all the time through the exam!

noPermissionTip.message: You are not authorized to take this exam. If you have any questions, please contact the exam organizer.

multipleSessions.message: This exam contains multiple sessions. Please log in to view the sessions and exam time you can   participate in.

deviceAbnormalityTip.message: The device monitoring is on and you are not allowed to change the device or browser during the exam. Please use the device or browser that entered the exam for the first time to answer the questions.

ipAbnormalityTip.message: IP monitoring is on. Students are not allowed to switch to another network during the exam (Switching the network may cause the IP address to change).

useCodeTip.message: If you need to change the device/browser under special circumstances, please ask the proctor for the verification code, and {useCode} to enter the exam.

faceVerificationTip.message: You have not completed the face verification and cannot take the exam via face verification.

useCodeEnter.message: Use the verification code to enter the exam

agreenExamNotes.message: I have read and agree to the items in the exam instructions

faceVerificationDesc.message: Please face the camera and make sure there is enough light. Can't perform face verification?

examCodeTip.message: Ask your teacher or proctor for the verification code and enter the code below.

cameraMonitorDesc.message: After the camera monitoring is turned on, the system will detect and record your suspicious behaviors such as leaving seat, deviated eye focus, talking with others, etc. Please make sure:  {br}1. Adjust the camera as needed so that your head/face fully appear in the camera view when you are sitting in front of the exam device to take the exam. {br}2. During the exam, focus your eyes on the exam screen, do not leave the seat, and do not talk with others.

resultsNotAnnounce.message: The results of this exam won’t be posted.

resultsNotYetAnnounce.message: Results have not yet been posted

ipPermissionsTip.message: Current IP {ip} does not have access to the exam -  Please use the specified device to take the exam!

lateTip.message: You are not allowed to take the exam since you have passed the permitted late start time.

noCameraTip1.message: Face verification is turned on for this exam and please use a device with a front-facing camera to take the exam.

noCameraTip2.message: Camera monitoring is turned on for this exam and please use a device with a front-facing camera to take the exam.

examNotStart.message: The exam is not started yet

expireTip.message: Login timed out, please log in again!

ltiTip1.message: If you need to take the exam via ULearning APP or ULearning Lockdown Browser, you can log in with your U-Test account. Your username is: {loginName}, and the initial password is the same as the username.

ltiTip2.message: If you need to take the exam via ULearning APP or ULearning Lockdown Browser, you can log in with your U-Test account. Your username is: {loginName}, and the initial password is the same as the username. You can modify your password after loggin in.

accountTipContent.message: Welcome to the ULearning Exam System. We have registered an ULearning account for you. If you need to take the exam via your mobile device, please download the ULearning APP (if you haven’t done so) and then log in with your ULearning account.

passwordTip.message: The initial password is the same as your username, you can change your password after login.

openAppTip.message: If the ULearning APP is not launched successfully, please check whether it is installed. If it is not yet installed, please download and install it first.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete it?

transcodeTip.message: The file is being transcoded, please try again later.

transcodeTip1.message: The file is being transcoded, please try again later

recordingTip.message: There is another audio recording in progress, please close it first.

noRecordingTip.message: Recording access is off. Enable it in the browser settings.

uploadAudioFail.message: Failed to upload the recording - Please check network connection

uploadFileError3.message: The file type is not supported

playTimesError.message: Error - The number of plays is incorrect

answerCanChangeTip.message: The answers for the blanks do not need to be in order.

enableUploadTip.message: When publishing the exam, you can choose whether to allow students to upload attachments

examUploadTip.message: When selecting a file, the system will temporarily exit full screen. Please complete the file selection and return to the exam screen within 30 seconds. Then, click any blank area on the screen to return to full screen. Otherwise the system will log it as leaving exam.

inputFormulaTip.message: Click the formula icon on the left to enter the formula

inputScoreTip.message: Enter a score of {num} (One decimal place is allowed)

inputAnaly.message: Click to enter the answer explanation

inputAnalyTip.message: The answer explanation cannot exceed  {n} characters

optionContentTip1.message: The choice content cannot be empty

questionTitleTip1.message: The question can not be empty!

insertBlankTip.message: Hit the Tab key also allows you to insert a blank item

inputAnswerTip2.message: For multiple correct answers, please use "//" to separate them

answerTip.message: The answers for the blanks do not need to be in order

addBlankTip1.message: Add at least one blank item

inputFormulaTip1.message: The formula length needs to be between 1 and {n} characters

inputDeviationTip.message: The error needs to be between 0-{n}

unableToCalculateAnswer.message: Cannot be calculated - check your formula!

inputRangeTip.message: Please enter a valid value range

readTextTip.message: English only, no more than {n} words

inputReferenceAnswer.message: Click to enter the reference answer

completeRemarkTip.message: Congratulations! All students in your class have been graded

remarkTip.message: Question {n} is not graded, save it now?

inputPartName.message: Click to enter the section name

paperUsedTip1.message: This exam is in use. Only the question stem, answers, and points can be edited. The exam structure cannot be modified. Don't add/delete questions or sub-questions (for combination questions). {br}If the question answers or points is changed, re-grade the exam.

previewTip.message: Add at least one question to each section to save or preview it.

previewTip1.message: Question {n} is not saved - please save the question first

addPartTip.message: Add up to {n} sections per exam.

deletePartTip.message: Deleting a section will delete all questions in that section. Newly created section questions won't be saved to the question bank and cannot be undone after deletion, so please use caution with deletion. Are you sure you want to delete it?

addPartQuestionTip.message: No more than {n} questions per section.

confirmCancelEdit.message: Are you sure to cancel the modification?

confirmDeleteQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to delete this question?

exitTip.message: The exam has not been saved.  If you exit now, the new questions created here will be lost. Are you sure you want to exit?

exitTip1.message: Question {n} is not saved. If you exit now, the editing won't be saved. Are you sure you want to exit?

confirmExit.message: Are you sure you want to exit?

joinExamByCode.message: Enter the exam by verification code

networkErrorTip1.message: The system has temporarily saved your answers locally - Do not leave or close the exam screen. Try to re-submit the exam later.

networkErrorTip2.message: Network error, the exam cannot be loaded normally. Please check the network and restart the exam after the network is recovered.

networkErrorTip3.message: Data error, the exam cannot be loaded normally. Please contact customer service.

notExitFullScreenTip.message: Do not exit full screen during the exam. Otherwise it will be logged as leaving exam and might be treated as cheating.

submitPaperErrorTip.message: Please do not close the page - The system is submitting your exam!

submitPaperErrorTip1.message: Network unavailable - Please check your network connection!

submitPaperErrorTip2.message: Submission failed. Please do not close the page - The system is re-submitting your exam!

notAllowedSubmitTip.message: The exam is not allowed to submit within {time} minutes after the exam starts

confirmPaperTip.message: Are you sure you want to submit?

confirmPaperTip1.message: Question {n} is not yet answered. Do you still want to submit the exam?

timeOverTip.message: The time has run out. Your exam will be submitted automatically in 3 seconds.

switchPartTipAboutRecording.message: A recording is still in progress. Switching to another section will stop the recording. Are you sure you want to switch?

submitTipAboutUpload.message: File uploading is still in progress - Please submit it later!

saveTipAboutUpload.message: File uploading is still in progress - Please save later!

notExitTip.message: You're not allowed to exit full screen or leave the exam screen during the exam!

leaveTimesTip.message: You've left the exam screen {n} times!

guide1.message: Welcome to the new version of the exam system. Let's take a look at the changes.

guide2.message: On the left , you can add, move and delete exam sections. Click the section name to switch to that section.

guide3.message: Click here to edit the section name and description.

guide4.message: In this new version, you can create and edit questions in the exam directly ! Select a question type here to add a new question. Of course, you can also import questions from the question bank.

guide5.message: New questions created here will not be automatically saved to the question bank. If necessary, you can use the Import from Exam function in the question bank to import the questions from the exam into the question bank.

guide6.message: Batch setting of points per question and number of plays per audio moved here.

guide7.message: Click here to preview the exam when editing.

guide8.message: Remember to click Save after all editing.

paperUsedTip.message: This exam is in use. Only the question stem, answers, and points can be edited. The exam structure cannot be modified. Don't add/delete questions or sub-questions (for combination questions).

cameraErrorTip.message: Camera monitoring error - The camera fails to start. Please check whether: {br}1. Camera access is not enabled. {br}2. The camera is used by another program. {br}3. The network is unavailable. {br}If any of the above exists, please fix it and then click the Continue to Answer button.

bankNameError1.message: The folder name cannot be empty.

bankNameError2.message: The folder name cannot exceed 200 characters.

bankNameError3.message: The folder name cannot contain the following characters: <> *?:" '|/\~.'"

bankNameError4.message: Folders can be added up to 5 levels, the current directory is level {l}, no subfolders can be added to this folder.

writeBankName.message: Click to enter the folder name

importBankOverNum.message: The number of questions exceeds the upper limit.

importLoadMsg1.message: Please be patient as the export time may be long.

importLoadMsg2.message: If your browser blocks pop-ups, please set it to always allow pop-ups.

imporBanktNone.message: There are no questions in this folder.

paperImportError.message: When you import questions from a exam to this folder, the folder level will exceed the upper limit. The question bank supports up to 5 levels of folders, please reselect a folder to import.

downloadTemplateMsg.message: Download the Excel template, and fill in the questions according to the instructions.

uploadFileError.message: Some of the questions contain invalid data, please check and modify before uploading.

paperChoiceQueMsg1.message: Import up to 200 questions at a time.

paperChoiceQueMsg2.message: Import up to 200 questions at a time.

moveFailMsg1.message: The folder level cannot exceed 5 levels, and the sum of the levels of the target folder and the current folder exceeds the upper limit and cannot be moved.

moveFailMsg2.message: A folder with the same name exists in the target folder and cannot be moved.

choiceTeacherError1.message: Please select the teacher you want to share

choiceTeacherError2.message: Please select the teacher you want to share

queBankEmpty.message: There are no questions in this folder.

deleteConfirmNew.message: Are you sure you want to delete {n}?

deleteConfirm1.message: If you select Delete Folder, but Keep Questions, the questions contained in the folder will be moved to the root directory after deletion.

deleteConfirm2.message: If you select Delete All, the questions in the folder will be deleted as well.

deleteConfirm4.message: Are you sure you want to delete the {n} items?

deleteConfirm6.message: Data cannot be recovered after deletion.

deleteConfirm7.message: Are you sure you want to delete it? Data cannot be recovered after deletion.

sameQueinPaper.message: Similar question exist in the exam

tagsMsg.message: Tags (Up to 30 characters, hit Enter to add, up to 3 tags):

saveErrorTips2.message: Failed to save some of the quesionts!

numExceededTips.message: Add up to 200 questions at a time.

incompleteMessage1.message: The question title cannot be empty!

incompleteMessage5.message: The choices can not be empty.

incompleteMessage6.message: Click to enter the choice or delete the extra choices.

incompleteMessage7.message: The number of correct answers cannot exceed the number of choices.

incompleteMessage9.message: There are duplicate choices in the answer.

incompleteMessage11.message: The number of correct answers cannot be less than the number of blank items.

completionAnswerTips.message: Note: The answers for the blanks do not need to be in order.

changeScoreText.message: Are you sure to modify points in bulk?

questionEdit1.message: 1. The types of questions supported by this function: Multiple Choice, Multiple Response, True/False, Fill in the Blank, Essay Question.

questionEdit2.message: 2. Only plain text question can be imported. Questions that contain pictures, formulas, videos, and audio are not supported.

questionEdit3.message: 3. There are two ways to add a question: (1) Click on the question type above to add a new question and edit the question according to the template format. (2) Paste the question text  here , and the system will automatically identify the question type and generate the question.

questionEdit4.message: 4. After entering the questions, you can check whether the result indentified by the system is accurate in the preview area on the right, including question type, answer and points. Save after confirmation.

saveOutText.message: You have unsaved question(s) , are you sure you want to quit?

bindDownload.message: Download Moodle Question Bank Conversion Tool

downloadDesc1.message: 1. Download and install the format conversion tool (Windows system only).

downloadDesc2.message: 2. Export the question bank from Moodle into an xml format file. Only the following question types are supported: multiple choice, true/false, short answer, essay.

downloadDesc3.message: 3. Use the format conversion tool to convert the xml file to Excel format.

downloadDesc4.message: 4. Use ULearning's bulk import function to upload the Excel file and import the question bank.

importLoadFirst1.message: 1. With this function, you can export all the questions in this folder and its subfolders.

importLoadFirst2.message: 2. At present, it only supports exporting Excel format, and pictures, audio, video and other attachments of the questions can not be exported.
